Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.5.3 Abyākatapada » 2.5.3.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
86.
1435Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1436Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  kamme nava, vipāke nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
